DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; THE HYPE BEGINS
DOC.TEXT: " Brazil is in the U.S. World Cup_finals . But this is no mere final : it is for the decision of an epoch , to determine the first quadra-champion of the Cup , a match up of three-time champions and a reprise of 1970 , when Brazil last got this far ( and won 4 to 1 ) .And it is Brazil vs . Italy , one of the greatest classics of world soccer. "
